Name: Zombie Craft
About the game: The planet was captured by the evil dead, who want to destroy all living things! Only you can free civilians from the attacks of creepy zombies. Gather all your courage and go to battle! Do your best to exterminate the evil monsters. Test your fighting and aiming skills! This adventure will definitely not leave you indifferent. Fight with firearms or improvised items. The main thing is not to leave any chance to the hated zombies! Features of the app: Survival mode Realistic 3d design Convenient management Interactive gameplay Remember, the best weapons and shooting materials can only be found at the night! You need to defeat many mobs if you want to get unique funds! Improve your skills to become invincible. But don't forget that zombies are very fast. Develop your agility and reaction speed to be ready for unexpected battles! Explore all locations to find every zombie lair! Destroy enemies and free the planet from the zombie apocalypse. Invite your friends to play with you. Develop a battle plan together and stop the chaos! The minimalistic style of play, smooth controls, and an interesting storyline will not leave indifferent any player! Download the application as soon as possible and see for yourself. Enjoy high-quality gameplay and get incredible emotions from your leisure time!
